summary.para: Gets the number of supported audio formats in the list

param.name: count
param.para: The number of supported audio formats in the list.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

summary.para: Gets the format with the specified index in the list. The formats are listed in order of importance. The most preferable format is first in the list.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the item in the list to retrieve.

param.name: format
param.para: Pointer to a pointer to a WAVEFORMATEX structure describing a supported audio format.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

summary.para: Provides a list of supported audio formats. The most preferred format is first in the list. Get a reference to this interface by calling .
